briefTitle: Breast Cancer and Breast Self-examination Education
officialTitle: The Effect of Breast Cancer and Breast Self-examination Education Given to Women on Breast Cancer Fear and Breast Examination Skills
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Champion Breast Cancer Fear Scale Change
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Able to read and write,
* Having no history of breast cancer,
* No communication barriers,
* Not pregnant or lactating,
* Those who are willing and agree to participate in the research.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Having a mental illness,
* Those who wish to withdraw from any part of the research.
